comments.body: We should add an example for state=absent

- name: remove a VLAN IP range for network test

comments.body:
break the loop in case we found the first match?

~~~diff
                     if params['startip'] == ipr['startip'] and params['endip'] == ipr['endip']:
                         self.ip_range = ipr
+                        break
~~~
Indeed, no need to continue if we have a first match

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +235,239 @@                for ipr in ip_range_list:
                    if params['startip'] == ipr['startip'] and params['endip'] == ipr['endip']:
                        self.ip_range = ipr
                        break
